name: Rename layer
description:
This plugin renames elements (that contains inner elements, like groups, frames..) by a specific inner text layer content.

For example, you have cards with a person's name: Run the plugin to rename all the cards by the matching name.


How it works?

  1. Add # to the beginning of the text layer’s name
  2. Select the layers you want to rename
  3. Run the plugin
  4. The external frame’s name will be updated
